project:adddependencies.name: project:adddependencies
project:adddependencies.description: Adds the missing dependencies to the manifest file.

all.name: all
all.description: Adds all missing dependencies to the SuiteCloud project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -feature, -file, and -object options.

feature.name: feature
feature.description: Specifies the feature dependency references to add to the project. Each reference is a name:value pair that is delimited by a space. For example, CUSTOMRECORD:required. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

file.name: file
file.description: Specifies the files to add to the project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

object.name: object
object.description: Specifies the object script IDs to add to the project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

account:setup:ci.name: account:setup:ci
account:setup:ci.description: Grants authorization for SuiteCloud SDK to access NetSuite with an account-role combination. It does not require browser-based login to NetSuite.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination.

certificateid.name: certificateid
certificateid.description: References the certificate ID obtained from NetSuite after uploading the public key file.

url.name: url
url.description: References the NetSuite domain of the account you want to use. It only needs to be specified if you want to use a customized NetSuite domain.

privatekeypath.name: privatekeypath
privatekeypath.description: References the local path to the private key file matching the certificate in NetSuite. For example: "d:/path/private-key.pem".

type.name: type
type.description: Specifies the type of the SuiteScript file that you want to create. For example, "ClientScript"

module.name: module
module.description: Specifies the SuiteScript modules you want to add to the SuiteScript file. For example, "N/record"

path.name: path
path.description: Specifies the File Cabinet path of the SuiteScript file to create. For example, "/SuiteScripts/ClientScipt.js".

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

project:create.name: project:create
project:create.description: Creates a SuiteCloud project, either a SuiteApp or an account customization project (ACP).

parentdirectory.name: parentdirectory
parentdirectory.description: Sets the parent folder where to create the project.

projectid.name: projectid
projectid.description: Specifies the project ID. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

projectversion.name: projectversion
projectversion.description: Specifies the project version. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

publisherid.name: publisherid
publisherid.description: Specifies the publisher ID. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

type.name: type
type.description: Specifies the project type. Enter one of the following options: ACCOUNTCUSTOMIZATION or SUITEAPP.

project:deploy.name: project:deploy
project:deploy.description: Deploys the folder containing the project. The project folder is zipped before deployment, only including the files and folders referenced in the deploy.xml file.

accountspecificvalues.name: accountspecificvalues
accountspecificvalues.description: Indicates how to handle the presence of account-specific values in an account customization project. If there are account-specific values in the project, enter WARNING to continue with the deployment process, or ERROR to stop it. If the option is not specified, the default value is ERROR. It only applies to account customization projects.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

applyinstallprefs.name: applyinstallprefs
applyinstallprefs.description: Applies the settings from the hiding.xml, locking.xml, and overwriting.xml files. It only applies to SuiteApps.

log.name: log
log.description: Sets the deployment log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, deployment log details are appended to that existing file.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

skip_warning.name: skip_warning
skip_warning.description: Indicates that the warning before deployment to production account will be skipped.

validate.name: validate
validate.description: Validates the project before deploying. If an error ocurrs during the deployment, the process is stopped.

file:import.name: file:import
file:import.description: Imports files from an account to your account customization project. You cannot import files from a SuiteApp.

paths.name: paths
paths.description: Specifies the File Cabinet paths of the files to import. For example, "/SuiteScripts/file.js".

excludeproperties.name: excludeproperties
excludeproperties.description: Excludes all file properties within the .attributes folder.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

object:import.name: object:import
object:import.description: Imports custom objects from your NetSuite account to the SuiteCloud project. In account customization projects (ACP), if SuiteScript files are referenced in the custom objects you import, these files get imported by default.

appid.name: appid
appid.description: Specifies your application ID. If specified, only custom objects with that application ID are imported. Otherwise, only custom objects with no application ID are imported.

scriptid.name: scriptid
scriptid.description: Specifies the script ID. To specify multiple IDs, enter the IDs separated by spaces. Enter "ALL" to import all custom objects of the specified type.

type.name: type
type.description: Specifies the type of custom objects to import. Enter "ALL" to import all custom objects. To see what custom objects are supported by SDF, see https://system.netsuite.com/app/help/helpcenter.nl?fid=sdfxml.html.

destinationfolder.name: destinationfolder
destinationfolder.description: Specifies the project folder where objects will be stored. It must be within the Objects folder of your project. For example, /Objects/MyObjects.

excludefiles.name: excludefiles
excludefiles.description: Indicates that the SuiteScript files referenced in custom objects are not imported. It can only be used in account customization projects (ACP).

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

file:list.name: file:list
file:list.description: Lists the files in the File Cabinet of your account.

folder.name: folder
folder.description: Specifies the File Cabinet path, for example, "/SuiteScripts". All files within subfolders are included.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

object:list.name: object:list
object:list.description: Lists the custom objects deployed in an account.

appid.name: appid
appid.description: Specifies your application ID. If specified, only custom objects with that application ID are listed. Otherwise, only custom objects with no application ID are listed.

scriptid.name: scriptid
scriptid.description: Specifies the script ID. If you specify it, only objects containing that script ID will be listed. Otherwise, all objects are listed.

type.name: type
type.description: Specifies the type of custom objects to list. To specify multiple types, enter the types separated by spaces. Otherwise, all types are listed. To see what custom objects are supported by SDF, see https://system.netsuite.com/app/help/helpcenter.nl?fid=sdfxml.html.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

account:manageauth.name: account:manageauth
account:manageauth.description: Manages authentication IDs for all your projects. An authentication ID is a custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination.

list.name: list
list.description: Prints a list of all the configured authentication IDs. Usage: manageauth -list.

info.name: info
info.description: Prints the following information for the specified authentication ID: account ID, role ID, and url. Usage: manageauth -info {authenticationID}.

rename.name: rename
rename.description: Renames an authentication ID. You must specify it together with the renameto option. Usage: manageauth -rename {authenticationID} -renameto {newAuthenticationID}.

renameto.name: renameto
renameto.description: Specifies the new ID for an authentication ID. You must specify it together with the rename option. Usage: manageauth -rename {authenticationID} -renameto {newAuthenticationID}.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Removes an authentication ID. This option only removes the credentials locally and it doesn't revoke the token from the account. Usage: manageauth -remove {authenticationID}.

project:package.name: project:package
project:package.description: Generates a ZIP file from your project, respecting the structure specified in the deploy.xml file.

destination.name: destination
destination.description: Specifies a path to store the ZIP file containing your project.

project.name: project
project.description: Specifies the path of your project folder.

object:update.name: object:update
object:update.description: Overwrites the custom objects in the project with the custom objects in an account.

scriptid.name: scriptid
scriptid.description: Specifies the script ID of the objects you want to overwrite.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

file:upload.name: file:upload
file:upload.description: Uploads files from your project to an account.

paths.name: paths
paths.description: Specifies the file cabinet paths of the files to upload. To specify multiple paths, enter a space between paths and enclose the entire argument in double quotes. For example, "/SuiteScripts/file.js" for account customization projects, and "/SuiteApps/com.project.example/script.js" for SuiteApp projects.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

project:validate.name: project:validate
project:validate.description: Validates the folder containing the SuiteCloud project.

accountspecificvalues.name: accountspecificvalues
accountspecificvalues.description: Indicates how to handle the presence of account-specific values in an account customization project. If there are account-specific values in the project, enter WARNING to continue with the deployment process, or ERROR to stop it. If the option is not specified, the default value is ERROR. It only applies to account customization projects.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination. Referred to as authentication ID and auth ID in the documentation.

applyinstallprefs.name: applyinstallprefs
applyinstallprefs.description: Applies the settings from the hiding.xml, locking.xml, and overwriting.xml files. It only applies to SuiteApps.

log.name: log
log.description: Sets the validation log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, validation log details are appended to that existing file.

project.name: project
project.description: Sets the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

server.name: server
server.description: Indicates that the server will perform the validation.
